mapper.select:
select admin_id, username from t_admin where 1=1 and `status`=true
and username=#{username}
select admin_id, username, enable_status, remark from t_admin where 1=1 and `status`=true and admin_id=#{adminId}

select a.admin_id, a.username, a.enable_status, a.remark, GROUP_CONCAT(r.role_name order by r.update_time) roleNames, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time from t_admin a left join t_auth_admin_role ar on ar.admin_id=a.admin_id left join t_auth_role r on r.`status`=true and r.role_id=ar.role_id where 1=1 and a.admin_id!='0' and a.`status`=true
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y%m%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
and a.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
GROUP BY a.admin_id ORDER BY a.update_time desc
